name: ObloLiving
0:
”Alexa, turn on lamp”
”Alexa, dim dimmer”
”Alexa, decrease thermostat by 5 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Oblo Living skill for Amazon Alexa, is trying to make your everyday life easier by keeping you and your home safe, more efficient and more comfortable.
OBLO Living skill for Amazon Alexa, will help you to activate a scene, control lights, dimmers, shutters, sensors and even more. 

To control the OBLO Living smart home system with Alexa you need:
•  OBLO Living Home Automation Gateway
•  OBLO Living account 
•  Amazon Alexa device
The user manual can be found at https://cloud.oblo.rs/alexamanual.pdf
Here are some of the voice commands OBLO Living has:
• Alexa, set all lights in ground floor to 50
• Alexa, run Movie scene
• Alexa, set all thermostats to 25 degress
